trans-unit.source: Specifies the state of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
Indicates that an attribute value is being written.
trans-unit.target: Indica que um valor de atributo está sendo gravado.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close" /> method has been called.
trans-unit.target: Indica que o método <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close" /> foi chamado.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that element content is being written.
trans-unit.target: Indica que o conteúdo do elemento está sendo gravado.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that an element start tag is being written.
trans-unit.target: Indica que uma marca de início do elemento está sendo gravada.

trans-unit.source: An exception has been thrown, which has left the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> in an invalid state.
trans-unit.target: Uma exceção foi gerada, o que deixou o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> em um estado inválido.

trans-unit.source: You can call the <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close" /> method to put the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> in the <see cref="F:System.Xml.WriteState.Closed" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Chame o método <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close" /> para colocar o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> no estado <see cref="F:System.Xml.WriteState.Closed" />.

trans-unit.source: Any other <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> method calls results in an <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" />.
trans-unit.target: Quaisquer outras chamadas de método <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> resultam em um <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" />.

trans-unit.source: This field was added in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] release.
trans-unit.target: Esse campo foi adicionado no [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] de versão.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the prolog is being written.
trans-unit.target: Indica que o prólogo está sendo gravado.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a Write method has not yet been called.
trans-unit.target: Indica que um método Write ainda não foi chamado.
